p: I've just made a new ring for you. It's very ugly! This time you need have no fear anything will happen.

Change of temperature will not matter. It will stand anything but walking on, hammering and the like. I wouldn't wash clothes on dishes while wearing it. But otherwise, you can wear it just like any ring.
But you won't want to wear it much; it's really quite ugly.
Sig and I are off to Aberdeen, S.D., etc Sunday A.M.
